SEARCH
Package org.codehaus.plexus.components.secdispatcher

Interface SecDispatcher

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultSecDispatcher
public interface SecDispatcher
This component decrypts a string, passed to it
Author:
Oleg Gusakov

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION
    The default path of configuration.
    static final String

    Attribute that selects a dispatcher.
    static final String

    Java System Property that may be set, to override configuration path.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION

      static final String DEFAULT_CONFIGURATION
      The default path of configuration.

      The character ~ (tilde) may be present as first character ONLY and is interpreted as "user home".

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • SYSTEM_PROPERTY_CONFIGURATION_LOCATION

      static final String SYSTEM_PROPERTY_CONFIGURATION_LOCATION
      Java System Property that may be set, to override configuration path.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DISPATCHER_NAME_ATTR

      static final String DISPATCHER_NAME_ATTR
      Attribute that selects a dispatcher.
      See Also:
      • availableDispatchers()
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • availableDispatchers

      Set<String> availableDispatchers()
      Returns the set of available dispatcher names, never null.

    • encrypt

      String encrypt(String str, Map<String,String> attr) throws SecDispatcherException
      encrypt given plaintext string
      Parameters:
      str - the plaintext to encrypt
      attr - the attributes, may be null
      Returns:
      encrypted string
      Throws:
      SecDispatcherException - in case of problem

    • decrypt

      String decrypt(String str) throws SecDispatcherException
      decrypt given encrypted string
      Parameters:
      str - the encrypted string
      Returns:
      plaintext string
      Throws:
      SecDispatcherException - in case of problem
